title: Master Piece !
review: I have finally watched it and u could not find even one single loop . Al Pacino nailed it very hard loved every bit of it .

title: Could have been better !
review: I felt that movie had its ups and downs , it have quiet a few shocks but over all I would say it was strictly ok

title: A Must Watch !
review: My brother recommended me to watch it and from the start till the end it was gripping loved Pitt and Morgan , but since Kevin enters wow ! The movies goes into a roller coaster mode

title: Finally I saw it !
review: Excellent one by Martin , he nails it again . Loved Robert , joe & Pacino power packed performance I would say .

title: O v e r h y p e d
review: Sandra was good but this movie was over hyped , nothing great just a one time watch I would say

title: Brilliant !
review: Wow ! This one was truly a wow movie, loved each and every scene , the concept itself was super unique and I loved it

title: Wow !
review: Brilliant movie , the best war movie so far from our Indian cinema , Vicky has given his best performance till now after Raman raghav , m a big big fan of your work . URI Rocks !

title: Lovely Movie!
review: Loved it , so many things I was not aware about , anupam kher was great in the movie and the story was well portrayed !

title: Excellent TP Movie !
review: Abhishek shines out of all of them , he was incredible so was Srk and boman . Enjoyed it very much and I wish the helipad fight sequence could have been avoided . Rest everything was enjoyable .

title: Not better than the first one !
review: This sequel was a good one but not better than the first , visuals are fine and the characters shown are decent enough .

title: One of the best from Martin
review: Robert joe and Henry shine in this one , incredible direction by Martin loved the movie !

title: Finally after 48 years !
review: I finally watch it after 48 years ! What an excellent movie , performance wise each and every character shine in their own way , the twist and turns were amazing !
